verses.content: Mosie chun Israel thla mipui po po chu a ko khâwm a, an kuomah, “Hieng hi LALPA thupêk in ithaw dinghai chu a nih.

Ni ruk sûng chu sin thaw nîng a ta, ni sari ni ruok chu in ta dingin ni inthieng, LALPA kuoma châwl ṭawk ṭawkna ding châwlni a ni ding a nih; mi tukhawm chu niha ieng sin khawm thaw taphawt chu sukhlum an ni ngei ding a nih.
In umna hmun po poa chun châwlni chun mei khawm in sêm dêr ding a ni nawh,” a tih a.
Mosie chun Israel thla mipui po po kuoma chun, “Hi hi LALPA thupêk chu a nih,
‘Nangni lai LALPA kuoma thilpêk ding dâwl ro, mi tukhawm lungrila pêk inhâwkna nei chun LALPA kuoma thilpêk chu hung chawi sienla, rângkachak, tangkaruo le dârsen:
sahmul dumpâwl, a êm, a seninlâr le pât zai inhmi kawp le kêl hmul,
berâmchal vun suksenhai, seal vunhai le shittim thing;
chun, meivar dingin hriek le innâlna hriek ding le, riminhnik rawmi dingin thil riminhnikhai leh;
zakawsîng le âwmbela phûm onik lunghai le lung danghai leh.
“Chun, nangni laia themthiem taphawt hung hai sienla, LALPA thupêk hi thaw vawng raw hai se:
Biekbûk, a puon in le ân khum- na, a puonchepnahai le, a thing- phêkhai, a bangruhai, a banhai le a kerkuokhai,
Thuthlung bâwm le a zâwn- funghai, zângaina ṭhungpha le inkhumna puonzâr,
dâwkân le a zâwnfunghai le a thuomhnawhai po po le entirna bei chu:
elvartu ding khâwnvar siena, a hmangruohai le a khâwnvarhai le a meivar ta dinga hriek leh;
riminhnik rawna mâichâm a zâwnfunghai leh, innâlna hriek le riminhnik rawmi le kawtkhâr puon- zâr biekbûk kawtkhâra mi ding;
le pumrawhmang thil inhlânna mâichâm, a dârsen thuk leh, a zâwn- fung le a hmangruo po po leh, dâr maihûn le ân ṭhutna leh;
a tuolzâwl inhuonna puonzâr, le chutaka a banhai, le a kerkuokhai leh, a tuolzâwl inhuonna kawta puon- zâr leh;
biekbûka a kilna, a tuolzâwla a kilna le a hruihai leh;
Hmun Inthienga rawngbâwl- na dinga thiemtaka khâwng sil- fênhai, thiempu sina rawngbâwl dinga Aron silfên inthienghai le a naupasalhai silfênhai le chun,’ tiin,” a tih a.
Chun, Israel thla pungkhâwm po po chu Mosie kuoma inthawk an ṭin dar a.

Mi tin a lungril phûr tak le mi tin a lungrila inhâwkna nei taphawt chu an hung a; intuokna puon in sina ding le, chutaka rawngbâwlna po poa ding le, silfên inthieng dinga hmang ding LALPA thawlâwm chu an hung chawi a.

Lungrila pêk nuomna nei po po, pasal le nuhmei khawm, an hung a; puon kilnahai, hnâra khaimi kuol- hai, hmingnamna kutsebihai, bân- bunhai, rângkachak incheina chihai po po an hung chawi a; mi tinin LALPA ta dingin rângkachak thilpêk an inhlân tah a.
Chun, mi tin sahmul dumpâwl, a êm, a seninlâr le patzaiinhmi dâm, kêl hmul dâm, berâmchal vun suksenhai le seal vun neitu chun a hung chawi a.
Mi tin dârsen le tangkaruoa thilpêk inhlân theitu chun LALPA ta dinga thilpêkah a hung chawi bawk a.
Nuhmei themthiemhai po chu an kutin pat an kher a; sahmul dum- pâwl, a êm, a seninlâr le, patzaiinhmi an kherhai chu an hung chawi a.
Nuhmei themthiem phûrtakhai po po chun kêl hmul chu an kher a.
Ṭhuoituhai chun onik lung le lung dang zakawsîng le âwmbela phûm ding chu an hung chawi a;
meivar dingin le, innâlna hriek le riminhnik rawmihai hmang dingin riminhnikhai leh.
Israel thlahai pasal tin le nu- hmei tin an lungrila pêk nuomna neihai chun LALPAIN Mosie hmanga thu a pêk tah sin po po thâwnaa dingin anni nuomthua LALPA ta dinga thilpêk chu an hung pêk a.
Chun, Mosiein Israel thlahai kuoma chun, “En ta u, LALPA chun Juda hnama mi Hur naupa Uri nau- pasal a hming Bezalel chu a ko tah a nih;
ama chu varnaa le hrietthiem- naa le, kutthiem sin tinrêng thaw- theina le hrietnaa chun Pathien Thlarauin suksip a nih;
kutthiem sinhai riruong dingin, rângkachak, tangkaruo le dârsena sinthaw dingin,
inbûk ding lung ât thiem ding- in, thing kermawi thiem ding le kut- thiem sin kawng tinrênga sin thaw dingin.
Dan hnama mi Ahisamak naupa Oholiab le ama chu mihai inchûktir theina a pêk ve veh a.

Anni chu kutthiem sin tinrêng thiemtuhai, riruongtuhai, sahmul dumpâwl, a êm le seninlâr le patzaiinhmi ṭhuimawi thiemhai le, puon khâwngtu sin – kutthiemna le riruongna sin tinrêng thaw thiem- nain a suksip tah a nih.
